mapper.select: SELECT * FROM coupon_shop ORDER BY expiry_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon_shop (coupon_idx, coupon_name, coupon_description, image_url, points) VALUES (coupon_idx_seq(), #{coupon_name}, #{coupon_description}, #{image_url}, #{points})
INSERT INTO coupon_purchases (purchase_idx, coupon_idx, coupon_name, paid_points, user_id) VALUES (#{purchase_idx}, #{coupon_idx}, #{coupon_name}, #{paid_points}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT cp.user_id, cp.purchase_idx, cp.coupon_name, cp.purchase_date, cs.coupon_description, cs.image_url, cs.expiry_date FROM coupon_purchases cp JOIN coupon_shop cs ON cp.coupon_name = cs.coupon_name WHERE cp.user_id = #{userId}
